comments.author: Vicky agarwal
comments.body: #Blockchain has the potential to restructure the music industry by ensuring artists get the #revenues they deserve from the sale and transfer of music. 📊🔥#KingsofLeon, #SteveAoki, and #SnoopDogg , have already stepped into the world of #NFTs to great success.✅💯
